product.longDescription: Naked Bear's smaller, but more abundant fruit produce higher seed yields than those of traditional hulless pumpkins. Harvest for flavorful pepitas. The semi-hulless seeds are excellent for roasting and snacking, and can be pressed for oil. Uniform and avg. 2–4 lb., its light orange fruits with gold flecking also make attractive ornamentals. From our experience, Naked Bear will yield a crop even under strong disease pressure. Treated seed. Also available untreated. Avg. 3,200 seeds/lb. Packet: 30 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Take advantage of our overstock position! Abundant yields of delicious seeds.

Naked Bear Treated (F1) Pumpkin Seed

Product ID:3387T.113387T

Naked Bear's smaller, but more abundant fruit produce higher seed yields than those of traditional hulless pumpkins. Harvest for flavorful pepitas. The semi-hulless seeds are excellent for roasting and snacking, and can be pressed for oil. Uniform and avg. 2–4 lb., its light orange fruits with gold flecking also make attractive ornamentals. From our experience, Naked Bear will yield a crop even under strong disease pressure. Treated seed. Also available untreated. Avg. 3,200 seeds/lb. Packet: 30 seeds.
